ModMetaData.name: Milkshakes - Chocolate Edition
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Mod Version: v1.2.1[/h1]
My milkshake brings all the modders to the yard.
This mod adds a new craftable recreation/luxury food (like chocolate).
[b]Features:[/b] [list] [*]Chocolate Milkshakes (Recreation/Luxury Food) [/list] Grants Mood Buff (3) for 24 hours after consumption.
[h1]Want the full collection instead? [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595980371]Milkshakes - Digital Deluxe Edition[/url][/h1]
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2591782692]Milkshakes[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595706669]Milkshakes - Ambrosia Edition[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2595120517]Milkshakes - Berry Edition[/url] [/list]
[b]Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]Compatible as long as you're not lactose intolerant. [/list]
[b]Balance:[/b] Wow, so balanced.
[url=https://discord.gg/rimworld]Click here to join us on the Community Discord![/url]
[h1]Credits:[/h1] [list] [*]SirLalaPyon for his amazing, high quality vanilla styled art. [*]Modded Food Textures from: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2553700067]Medieval Overhaul[/url] [*]Modded Clothing Textures from: [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2023513450]Vanilla Factions Expanded - Medieval[/url] [/list]
(CC BY-NC-ND 4.0)
[h1]Latest Changes:[/h1] [b]v1.2[/b] [list] [*][Change] Product from basic recipe reduced from 2 to 1. [*][Change] workAmount for basic recipe changed from 450 to 300. [*][Change] Basic ingredients required for basic recipe reduced from 6 to 4. [*][Buff] Special ingredients required for basic recipe reduced from 3 to 1. [*][Change] Product from batch recipe reduced from 6 to 4. [*][Change] workAmount for batch recipe changed from 1250 to 1050. [*][Buff] Special ingredients required for batch recipe reduced from 8 to 4. [*][Buff] Chocolate milkshake shelf life increased from 18 hours to 3 days. [*][Buff] Chocolate milkshake value increased from 5 to 11. [*][Buff] Chocolate milkshake nutrition increased from 0.15 to 0.30. [*][Nerf] Chocolate milkshake joy gain decreased from 0.60 to 0.25. [/list]
[b]v1.2.1[/b] [list] [*][Update] Added support for Milkshake - Blueberry & Strawberry Edition [/list]
